title: Tarantu-Lad: The World I Call Home
description: Searching for a place to call home and honor his parents’ legacy, Tarantu-Lad begins a life of vigilante justice. Quite possibly the finest film ever made. So moving! So inspiring!
quote: In the name of justice, your reign of terror is over, Buffer Fish!
altHero: bug superhero, Tarantu-Lad, pointing in the rain
alt1: a buff pufferfish man, Buffer Fish, covered in spikes and tattoos flexes his arms
alt3: a child holds her hands up to Tarantu-Lad’s unmasked face with two sets of bug eyes
alt4: the glowing ghosts of a man and woman with similar bug eyes look proud
